title: Layout
description: Customize the layout system in FlexiUI.

body.raw:
# Layout FlexiUI provides flexible layout utilities built on Tailwind CSS to help you create responsive designs. ## Container Use container utilities for responsive layouts: ```tsx
{/* Your content */}
``` ## Grid System Create grid layouts with Tailwind's grid utilities: ```tsx
Column 1
Column 2
Column 3
``` ## Flexbox Layouts Use flexbox for flexible layouts: ```tsx
Left
Right
``` ## Spacing FlexiUI uses Tailwind's spacing scale: ```tsx
Padding
Margin
Item 1
Item 2
``` ## Responsive Design Use responsive breakpoints: ```tsx
Responsive width
``` ## Max Width Control maximum width: ```tsx
{/* Content */}
``` ## Aspect Ratio Maintain aspect ratios: ```tsx
``` ## Stack Layout Create vertical stacks with consistent spacing: ```tsx
Item 1
Item 2
Item 3
``` ## Center Content Center content horizontally and vertically: ```tsx
Centered content
``` ## Sidebar Layout Create sidebar layouts: ```tsx
Sidebar
Main content
```
